title: Relates to the form and content of designating petitions for the office of board of education member for the city school district of the city of Albany
summary: Relates to clariflying the form and content of designating petitions for the office of board of education member for the city school district of the city of Albany.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1382

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. McENENY, CANESTRARI -- read once and referred to
         the Committee on Education

       AN ACT to amend the education law, in  relation  to  petitions  for  the
         office  of  board of education of the city school district of the city
         of Albany

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1. Paragraph e of subdivision 9 of section 2502 of the educa-
    2  tion law, as added by chapter 65 of the laws of 1972, is amended to read
    3  as follows:
    4    e. Petitions for the nomination of members of such school board  shall
    5  be on white paper containing the required signatures of qualified voters
    6  of  the  city of Albany [who were registered to vote therein at the last
    7  preceding general election]. The sheets of  such  a  petition  shall  be
    8  numbered  consecutively,  beginning with number one, at the foot of each
    9  sheet. Such a petition must set forth in every instance the correct date
   10  of signing, the full name of the signer[,]  AND  his  [present]  OR  HER
   11  residence[,  the  residence  from which he was registered at the time of
   12  the last preceding general election, the ward of such residence at  such
   13  time,  the  election  district  thereof  at such time. A signer need not
   14  himself fill in the date, residence  or  residences,  ward  or  election
   15  district.  The election district of the signer to be filled in the peti-
   16  tion shall be the election district in effect at the time  of  the  last
   17  preceding  general  election. If the residence from which the signer was
   18  registered at the time of the last preceding  general  election  is  the
   19  same  as  his present residence, the word "same" may be written, instead
   20  of repeating the place of residence]. A SIGNER NEED ONLY  PLACE  HIS  OR
   21  HER SIGNATURE UPON THE PETITION, AND NEED NOT HIMSELF OR HERSELF FILL IN
   22  THE OTHER REQUIRED INFORMATION.

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD01977-01-1

       A. 1382                             2

    1    S  2.  Paragraph  f  of subdivision 9 of section 2502 of the education
    2  law, as added by chapter 65 of the laws of 1972, is amended to  read  as
    3  follows:
    4    f.  Each  sheet of such a petition shall be signed in ink and shall be
    5  substantially in the following form:
    6    I, the undersigned, do hereby state that I am a duly  qualified  voter
    7  of  the  city  of  Albany, [that I was registered to vote therein at the
    8  time of the last preceding general election,] that my [present] place of
    9  residence [and my place of residence at the time of the  last  preceding
   10  general  election  are] IS truly stated opposite my signature hereto, [I
   11  intend to support at the ensuing election,] and I do hereby nominate the
   12  following named person as a candidate  for  nomination  for  the  public
   13  office   of   member  of the board of education of the city of Albany to
   14  be  voted  for  at  the  election  to  be  held  on   the........... day
   15  of................,[19] 20.....

   16    In  witness  whereof,  I  have  hereunto  set my hand the day and year
   17  placed opposite my signature.

   18       Date                Name of Signer           [Present] Residence
   19                           (SIGNATURE REQUIRED)
   20                           (PRINTED NAME MAY
   21                           BE ADDED)
   22       ...............     .....................    ....................
   23       ...............     .....................    ....................
   24       ...............     .....................    ....................

   25             [At the Time of the Last Preceding General Election

   26       Residence           Ward                     Election District
   27       ...............     .....................    ....................
   28       ...............     .....................    ....................
   29       ...............     .....................    ....................]

   30    S 3. Paragraph g of subdivision 9 of section  2502  of  the  education
   31  law,  as  added by chapter 65 of the laws of 1972, is amended to read as
   32  follows:
   33    g. The petition shall be authenticated by  witnesses.  Such  statement
   34  shall  be  accepted  for all purposes as the equivalent of an affidavit,
   35  and if false shall subject the witness to the same penalties as if he OR
   36  SHE had been duly sworn. The form of such statement  shall  be  substan-
   37  tially as follows:

   38                            Statement of Witness

   39    I,...........................  (name  of  witness), state: I am a duly
   40  qualified voter of the state of New York, and now reside [in  the  city,
   41  town   or   village   of   .....................,  in  such  state,]  at
   42  ........................... [(fill in street and house number  and  post
   43  office)  therein]  (RESIDENCE ADDRESS).   [I was last registered for the
   44  general election in the year .......... from  ...............  (fill  in
   45  city,  town  or  village)  in  the  county of ................., in such
   46  state. The said residence was then in the ............ (fill in  number)
   47  election  district  of  the  ........................ (fill in ward in a
   48  city, or town, if outside a city). I know each of the voters whose names
   49  are subscribed to  this  petition  sheet  containing  (fill  in  number)

       A. 1382                             3

    1  .................  signatures and each of them subscribed the same in my
    2  presence  and  upon  so  subscribing  declared  to me that the foregoing
    3  statement, made and subscribed by him, was true.]
    4    EACH  OF  THE  INDIVIDUALS WHOSE NAMES ARE SUBSCRIBED TO THIS PETITION
    5  SHEET  CONTAINING  ..................  (FILL  IN   NUMBER)   SIGNATURES,
    6  SUBSCRIBED THE SAME IN MY PRESENCE ON THE DATE ABOVE INDICATED AND IDEN-
    7  TIFIED HIMSELF OR HERSELF TO BE THE INDIVIDUAL WHO SIGNED THIS SHEET.

    8                                                    ....................
    9                                                    Signature of witness
   10    Date.................

   11    S  4. This act shall take effect on the first of January next succeed-
   12  ing the date on which it shall have become a  law  and  shall  apply  to
   13  elections occurring on or after such date.
